column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////This big place has a looong line in weekends. The food is good but takes long time to serve
column2: and the portion is definitely too big. I'd go straight back to bed after leaving this place. Many people leave a lot of food when they leave
column3: particularly because this place is in the middle of the city. Freeze the leftover food and please ship it to Somalia. Seriously
column4: everything is a bit too big at this place.
